text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line r07_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r09_line r10_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r09_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r09_line r11_phr

LMNL.text: the face of one long dead —

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_line r13_phr

LMNL.text: Looks at me from the wall,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_line r14_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r14_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r14_phr r15_line

LMNL.text: The night-lamp casts a halo of pale light.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r18_line r19_phr

LMNL.text: Here in this room she died;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r18_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r18_line r20_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r20_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r20_phr r21_line

LMNL.text: Never through martyrdom of fire was led

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r20_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r20_phr r22_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r22_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r22_line r23_phr

LMNL.text: nor can in books be read

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r23_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r16_quatrain r17_s r23_phr r24_line

LMNL.text: The legend of a life more benedight.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r28_phr r29_line

LMNL.text: There is a mountain in the distant West

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r28_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r28_phr r30_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r30_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r30_line r31_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r30_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r30_line r32_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r32_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r26_tercet r27_s r32_phr r33_line

LMNL.text: Displays a cross of snow upon its side.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r36_phr r37_line

LMNL.text: Such is the cross I wear upon my breast

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r36_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r36_phr r38_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r38_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r38_line r39_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r39_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r39_phr r40_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r40_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r25_sestet r34_tercet r35_s r40_line r41_phr

LMNL.text: changeless since the day she died.
